Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.controller.ui.SoundManager
public class SoundManager extends Object
Manages all sound-related operations including: - Start sound playback - Local sound effect player references - Volume slider initialization and binding - Music fade-to-main transition scheduling This class extracts sound setup logic from GuiController without changing any behavior.

  • Constructor Details

    • SoundManager

      public SoundManager(Object resourceLoader)
      Creates a SoundManager with access to resources.
      Parameters:
      resourceLoader - The object to use for loading sound resources (typically 'this' from the controller)

  • Method Details

    • playStartSound

      public SafeMediaPlayer playStartSound()
      Plays the start sound. This is called once during initialization. Original location: GuiController.initialize()

    • initializeVolumeSliders

      public void initializeVolumeSliders(javafx.scene.control.Slider musicVolumeSlider, javafx.scene.control.Slider sfxVolumeSlider, Supplier<SafeMediaPlayer> mainPlayerGetter)
      Initializes music and SFX volume sliders with their bindings. Original location: GuiController.initialize() Platform.runLater block
      Parameters:
      musicVolumeSlider - The slider controlling music volume (0-100)
      sfxVolumeSlider - The slider controlling SFX volume (0-100)
      mainPlayerGetter - Function to get the current main player (for volume updates)

    • loadSmallSFX

      public void loadSmallSFX()
      Loads all small SFX players. These are kept as local references. Original location: GuiController.initialize() - "Load small SFX" section

    • scheduleFadeToMainMusic

      public void scheduleFadeToMainMusic(Runnable fadeToMainMusicCallback)
      Schedules the fade to main music after a delay. Original location: GuiController.initialize() - "Delay the music fade" section
      Parameters:
      fadeToMainMusicCallback - The callback to invoke when fade should start
